## Menu class

A Menu Custom HTML Element. Implements the [ARIA menu](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#menu)<!-- -->.


- The default slot for the menu items

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Menu extends FoundationElement 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [collapseExpandedItem()](./fast-foundation.menu.collapseexpandeditem.md) |  | Collapses any expanded menu items. |
|  [focus()](./fast-foundation.menu.focus.md) |  | Focuses the first item in the menu. |
